pages.text: Star's Edge, the majestic two-handed Twinblade, resonates with the cosmic essence of a star. In the radiant embrace of daylight, Star's Edge surges with energy, allowing it to deal additional damage.

As night descends, Star's Edge transforms once more. Bathed in the ambient glow of the moon and stars, the Twinblade exudes a calming aura. Its strikes, now imbued with lunar influence, siphon health from enemies.
